name: Guild District
description: A neighborhood dominated by trade guilds and professional organizations; adventurers can seek specialized services, join guilds, or navigate guild politics.
atmosphere: Imposing guild halls with elaborate facades line the streets, their doors guarded by serious-looking officials. The air carries the scent of wealth and power, with the sound of business negotiations drifting from open windows. Guild banners and coats of arms are displayed prominently, marking territory and influence.
